creator.description:
Add some flair to your profile! Here's how:

1. Subscribe to this account
2. Like the posts that mention the labels you want to add

If you want to get rid of the labels, like the post that deletes them all.

Managed by @hmps.se

locales.description: I am working on a side project.
locales.name: Side project

locales.description: Turning caffeine into code every Saturday and Sunday!
locales.name: Weekend Warrior

locales.description: I am a full-time indie hacker.
locales.name: Full time

locales.description: One-person army: developer, designer, support, and coffee maker.
locales.name: Solo

locales.description: I am running this off the straps of my boots!
locales.name: Bootstrapped

locales.description: No VCs in sight - just me, myself, and my savings account.
locales.name: Self Funded

locales.description: Building in public because sharing is caring!
locales.name: Open Source

locales.description: That magical moment when someone first believed in my project enough to pay for it!
locales.name: 1st $

locales.description: Making enough to keep the instant noodles flowing and the dream growing!
locales.name: Ramen+

locales.description: Breaking into three digits monthly. Every journey begins with a first step!

locales.description: A thousand wonderful humans believe in what I built. Mind = blown!
